# encode(to:)

**Instance Method**

Encodes the elements of this array into the given encoder in an unkeyed container.

## Declaration

```swift
func encode(to encoder: any Encoder) throws
```

## Parameters

- **encoder**: The encoder to write data to.

## Discussion

This function throws an error if any values are invalid for the given encoder’s format.

## Encoding and Decoding

- **init(from:)**: Creates a new array by decoding from the given decoder.

items.description: Creates a new array by decoding from the given decoder.
